body.p: The publishing Connectors page shows the publishing connectors that are defined for a project. To reach the page, go to Deliverables (found at the bottom of the left navigation stripe when inside a project), then click Connectors from the left stripe.

section.title: Available Connector Types
section.p: The following connector types are available for Content Fusion:

ul.li: Content Fusion Docs Web Platform - This built-in connector is only available in the Cloud version. It deploys the output to a web platform that is accessible publicly. When you create a new project, Content Fusion automatically generates this connector for that project. You can click the View deployments button to see a pop-up window with the deployments for this connector. Each deployment includes a link to open the output for the latest successful build, which you can share with others.

section.note: The Content Fusion Docs Web Platform connector does not need to be configured, it will be created immediately.
section.p: To create a new connector, click the New Connector button located in the top-right corner of the page. Then, select the desired connector type and fill in the necessary fields in the resulting dialog box.
You can click the ellipsis (3 vertical dots) to the right of a connector to reveal actions to Edit or Delete it.
You can click the ellipsis (3 vertical dots) to the right of a connector to reveal actions to View deliverables for the connector, Edit it, or Delete it.
